Quality Education.reason: The course provides 'a basic understanding of financial accounting' and teaches students 'how to prepare simple financial statements' for decision-making, directly contributing to quality education.
evidence: This course is designed to provide a basic understanding of financial accounting
students will learn how to prepare simple financial statements and also learn how to read, understand and use published financial statements for decision-making.
